pageContext.claim: “Has @BubbaWallace apologized to all of those great NASCAR drivers & officials who came to his aid, stood by his side, & were willing to sacrifice everything for him, only to find out that the whole thing was just another HOAX? That & Flag decision has caused lowest ratings EVER!”
pageContext.analysis: A bizarre broadside from a president known to make racist accusations. Wallace is the only top NASCAR driver who is African American. A noose was found hanging from his garage door. Wallace did not see or report it; NASCAR officials told him about it.
